'''Nathan 'Dinnerbone' Adams''' is a Software Engineer<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/credits</ref> at [[Mojang Studios]] who works on ''[[Java Edition]]'' and the ''[[Minecraft Launcher]]''. 

== About ==

A common trope attributed to Dinnerbone is that he is commonly displayed as being upside-down.<ref name="skin">{{tweet|Dinnerbone|252373552840462336|So I'm thinking it's time for me to actually have a real Minecraft skin, and not this silly upside down one. To the pixelmakingmachine!|Sep 30, 2012}}</ref><ref name="upsidedown">{{Reddit|1t6qn7/i_am_dinnerbone_a_minecraft_developer_ask_me/ce4vtm7}}</ref> His Twitter avatar is flipped<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|378567077793382400|Things I've learned this week: Turn your avatar upside down, and you'll get lots of messages from helpful people pointing it out to you.|Sep 13, 2013}}</ref> and his user [[model]] (as well as any [[mob]] named "Dinnerbone") is rendered upside-down.<ref name="upsidedown" /> Shortly after starting [[mcservers:Bukkit|Bukkit]], Dinnerbone was hired by [[wikipedia:Curse LLC|Curse]] where he worked until joining [[Mojang Studios]] on February 28, 2012 to develop the mod API.<ref>http://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/s0pqt/i_am_nathan_adams_aka_dinnerbone_developer_of/c4a68cn?context=1</ref><ref>http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/bukkit-the-next-chapter.62489/ https://web.archive.org/web/20120302070401/http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/bukkit-the-next-chapter.62489/</ref> In October 2015, he announced that he would be "taking a break from ''Minecraft'' PC development for a few months."<ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|654680133660311553|After that I'm taking a break from Minecraft PC development for a few months. I will be focusing on the new launcher & other cool projects!|Oct 15, 2015}}</ref> Later, in February 2016, he further elaborated that though he would continue on other projects at Mojang, he had left the ''Minecraft'' team.<ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|700803356449574912|@half_decent I don't work on Minecraft anymore :)|Feb 19, 2016}}</ref> On February 6, 2017, Dinnerbone confirmed he had rejoined the ''Minecraft'' team.<ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|828601917639184384|Spent today moving desks at Mojang... Oh hey, I'm rejoining the Minecraft PC team! It's been so long, so much has changed!|February 6, 2017}}</ref> On July 30, 2022, he claimed that he had been off work for 1.5 years for his health.<ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|1553226276844048385|To those mailing/tweeting/DMing/etc me blaming & insulting me about some Minecraft stuff: I've been off work for 1.5 years for my health. I physically can't get out of bed most of the time and it's getting worse by the day. I have nothing to do with anything you're upset over.|Jul 30, 2022}}</ref> On February 18, 2025, he announced that he's coming back on developing ''Minecraft.''<ref>{{Bluesky|dinnerbone.com|3lihzvfzgxk2n|Hello world! üôÉ
I'm alive! Kinda! Ish!
I've managed to go to the mojang office 5 whole times this year! That's a big achievement for my health and I'm pretty proud.

Now I'm hard at work doing [things] on Minecraft, and I feel like it's going pretty well so far! So many deleted lines of code!|February 18, 2025}}</ref>

== Biography ==

Nathan Adams is originally from [[wikipedia:Shrewsbury|Shrewsbury]], [[wikipedia:United Kingdom|United Kingdom]]. He learned programming through creating [[wikipedia:MSN|MSN]] bots at age 10.<ref name=djinnibone/><ref>http://blog.jetbrains.com/blog/2014/02/20/chatting-with-nathan-adams-and-erik-broes-of-minecraft/</ref> After finishing secondary school, Dinnerbone was rejected from college,<ref>http://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/1t6qn7/i_am_dinnerbone_a_minecraft_developer_ask_me/ce5pwb1?context=1</ref> so he found a job with a tiny web development company, but was made redundant after a few years. 

In 2013 he was engaged to [[Aleksandra ZajƒÖc|Aleksandra 'Missmarzenia' ZajƒÖc]].<ref name="polish">{{tweet|dinnerbone|331838325629538304|@Evangeder @KebabuTurka My fiancee, @MissMarzenia, is polish :)|May 7, 2013}}</ref> He announced on August 24, 2016 that he and Aleksandra were expecting a baby boy.<ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|768464749533114368|Lots of people asking why I won't be going to Minecon. It's because I'll be too busy learning how to use these!|August 24, 2016}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|768467806320865280|(It's gonna be a boy. If it were a girl, it'd be "Wednesday Adams" no question.)|August 24, 2016}}</ref> The baby was later born on October 2, 2016<!--no other tweets by both of them speak about birth date - the tweet likely implies he was just born, so the birth date is set at October 2, 2016-->.<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|782527672010276864|Hello, world.|October 2, 2016}}</ref> In some time between 2016 and 2021 they broke up.<ref name=":0">https://missmarzenia.blogspot.com/2021/01/it-has-been-5-years.html Aleksandra ZajƒÖc in her blog on January 20, 2021</ref>


In 2019 he obtained Swedish citizenship.

== Videos ==
Dinnerbone was face of [[Dinnerbone migration campaign|migration campaign]] in 2020. During the campaign Minecraft account on Youtube released two videos featuring him as Minecraft character.{{yt|i9cqIwrgz7w}}

== Trivia ==
* Dinnerbone is red-green [[wikipedia:Color blindness|colorblind]], which is the most common type of colorblindness.<ref>http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/future-updates/384441-1-5-new-blocks-items?comment=11</ref>
** This is why rubies were replaced by [[emerald]]s.<ref>https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/future-updates/384441-1-5-new-blocks-items?page=2</ref>
* Dinnerbone's username is a tribute to an old friend of his named Teabone (T-bone).<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|248379944101609472|@XxzJackozxX I once, long ago when I was new to the whole interwebs thing, knew a cool guy named Teabone. I took this name in respect to him|Sep 19, 2012}}</ref>
* Dinnerbone's favorite color is blue, his favorite foods are lasagna and pizza, and his "guilty pleasure" is milkshakes.<ref name=MilkshakeKetchup>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|1068931314227822593|My guilty pleasure is milkshakes. I love milkshakes.<br><br>Today I went to go get a nice strawberry milkshake at this new place that opened near me. They accidentally used ketchup instead of strawberry jam and oh my gosh do I hate ketchup. What a mistake to make! ü§¢|December 1, 2018}}</ref>
* If the [[player]] uses a [[Name Tag|name tag]] titled "Dinnerbone", on most [[mob|mobs]] it will turn upside-down. This naturally extends to himself. The same effect is applied when naming a mob "[[Grumm]]".
* Dinnerbone could sometimes be found on the MindCrack server with other [[YouTube]]rs.
* Dinnerbone was a member of the Hermitcraft server during its early days.
* Dinnerbone's bodyguard in [[A Fun Announcement by Dinnerbone]] flipped him right side up. He remains this way throughout both migration videos.
* Dinnerbone makes an appearance in the trailer for [[Element Animation]]'s "T.E.A.V.S.R.P" (The Element Animation Villager Sounds Resource Pack),<ref>{{YouTube link|yG_Y52bK6Ec|The Element Animation Villager Sounds Resource Pack (T.E.A.V.S.R.P.)|Element Animation|February 8, 2014}}</ref> which would later be used for an [[April Fools' Day jokes|April Fools' Day joke]].
